ratings.question_text: Your level of engagement with the course was:
What is your overall assessment of this course?
The course was well organized to facilitate student learning.
I received clear feedback that improved my learning.
Relative to other courses you have taken at Yale, the level of intellectual challenge of this course was:
Relative to other courses you have taken at Yale, the workload of this course was:

narratives.question_text: What knowledge, skills, and insights did you develop by taking this course?
comments: A lot of new information on internal migration that I did not know about earlier
Knowledge about the Indian diaspora and their struggles

I developed my reading comprehension and writing skills for Hindi this semester. 
I also learned a lot about Hindi within the context of diaspora and migration, and also had the opportunity to reflect upon the experiences of myself and my family and how they have shaped the Hindi diaspora

narratives.question_text: What are the strengths and weaknesses of this course and how could it be improved?
comments: Great class, was very engaging! Swapna ji teaches very well, and is a very kind person!
Great course with lots of readings, suitable for advanced speakers.
Swapna Ji is a gem. She is so kind and understanding and promotes learning in a low stakes and enjoyable environment. There are genuinely no weaknesses - Swapna Ji makes Hindi the best class at Yale.
Great course for anyone looking to learn more about the Indian Diaspora

I really enjoyed the breadth and depth of this course and the relavence of the materials we studied and the conversations we had. It was incredibly interesting and I truly had so much fun and was intelectually stimulated throughout.

narratives.question_text: Would you recommend this course to another student? Please explain.
comments: If you are a heritage or native Hindi speaker, I highly recommend taking this course to improve your Hindi while exploring interesting topics.
Yes if they can speak read and write hindi

Yes!! Take this course especially if you have a hectic semester. It is a very enjoyable class that takes any stress off your shoulders when youre in it and discussing the latest article or video youve seen. Swapna Ji makes a great effort to involve everyone and is incredibly understand, kind, and open in her thoughts and beliefs.
yes it was a good interactive way to learn hindi and swapna ji is great
Definitely! It's a great course and Swapna ji is an amazing professor

Yes definetly. Not only is this a relatively easy language class, but it also allowed me to learn and grow so much as a Hindi speaker. Within the span of one semester my vocabulary increased significantly, I found myself reading faster, and speaking more fluently than I had before taking this class. Swapnaji is truly passionate about Hindi literature and the course work and it showed in the class.
